snippet.title: Kingmakers | Winter Games Expo Trailer - Early Access Release in Q1 2025 AD
snippet.description:
Kingmakers is releasing in Early Access in Q1 of 2025, announced at the OTK Winter Games Expo!
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2109770/Kingmakers/

Kingdom of England – Dec. 4, 1524 – People! I, the messenger o' His Grace, hereby declare that, per the decision o' publisher tinyBuild and developer Redemption Road Games, Kingmakers, known among the realm as an epic medieval sandbox mix o' third-person shooter, city builder and real-time strategy, shall grace the plains o' Steam withal its presence nay later than the end o' Q1 2025.  

The game hath amassed more than one million wishlists, and so His Grace is expecting a glorious battle, once the legendary warrior o' the future arriveth withal his allieth and an enormous arsenal o' peculiar weaponry ne'er ere seen across the entirety o' our Kingdom.  We have e'en received a pigeon withal a note mentioning ‘attack helicopters’ and ‘badass convertible sports cars’!
